attributes.action: Save the country £8 million a day by removing immigrants from uk hotels
attributes.additional_details: I believe this is being over looked and more and more are arriving on a daily basis, the government are always speaking about the whole left by the last government so let’s do something about this and remove the overwhelming numbers arriving in the uk and save £8 million a day
attributes.background: If the uk government were to remove the immigrants from the hotels this would save circa £8,000,000 a day.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/702908
